content.description:
Source: Human Development Report, United Nations Programme, 2017.

Note: The Human Development Index ranges from <math alttext="0 through 1"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>â€“</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, where 0 indicates a very low level of development and 1 indicates a very high level of development.
content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

Describe what the Human Development Index measures.

Using the data in the graph, describe the Human Development Index for the United Kingdom in 2015.

Using the data in the graph, describe a trend for all countries between 1980 and 2015.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
